Change Log
======================


0.0.1 (07/09/2020)
---------------------------------
- first package run

0.0.2 (08/09/2020)
---------------------------------
- Removed big size docs
- changed package name for syntax errors

0.0.3 (14/09/2020)
---------------------------------
- removed 'networkx' and 'matplotlib' dependencies
- Introduced Graph class into the package
- working examples to display package use
- cleaner code
- Added long description

0.0.4 (14/09/2020)
---------------------------------
- Graph class issue solved

0.0.5 (04/10/2020)
---------------------------------
- Search Algorithms implemented
